name: Creepypasta Land 3D Remake
description:
Welcome to a remake of a old game called

Creepypasta Land.

creepypasta land was originally created by Lucas Boato de Souza

creepypasta land is a horror game combined with rpg and creepypasta characters

in this fan remake version each days are expanded for more story and

creepy moments its recommanded to play in first person

there is collectible cards in this game the yu-gi-oh cards

so get ready to face the true meaning of fear. #fangame #rpg #horror

[this is in work in progress so dont expect too much only the 4 first days are playable]
